description: A chilling dystopian novel about totalitarianism, surveillance, and the dangers of absolute power.

title: Animal Farm
description: A political allegory using farm animals to reflect events leading up to the Russian Revolution.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: A classic love story set in 19th-century England, exploring issues of class, marriage, and society.

title: Emma
description: A witty novel about youthful hubris and romantic misunderstandings in the English countryside.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: The magical journey of a young wizard discovering his true heritage at Hogwarts School.

title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
description: Harry Potter's second year at Hogwarts is filled with mystery, danger, and dark secrets.

title: Adventures of Huckleberry Finn
description: A young boy and a runaway slave journey down the Mississippi River in search of freedom.

title: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
description: The mischievous adventures of a boy growing up along the Mississippi River.

title: Murder on the Orient Express
description: Detective Hercule Poirot investigates a murder on a luxurious train trapped in a snowstorm.

title: And Then There Were None
description: Ten strangers are trapped on an island and mysteriously murdered one by one.
